name: Songs of the Seasons
description:
A musical adventure for little movers!

Featuring a mix of classic and new tunes that are sure to get your young ones and you moving and grooving.

Join Ms. Aria and Ms. Saira in this interactive musical concert inspired by the sounds of nature! Part play and part party – complete with puppets! – young ones are invited on a journey of wonder and discovery. Learn about the budding life of a small seed, and watch it transform into the flower it was always meant to be. The dynamic duo of Ms. Aria and Ms. Saira bring their popular musical styles together to create an enjoyable and educational experience for the very young, and their caregivers.

Every show will be followed by Free Play in the Studio for 25 minutes.

name: Bealtaine Theatre Festival 2025
description:
We are excited to present a vibrant festival celebrating cultural exchange between Ireland and Canada. Enjoy bold theatre, music, and storytelling as creativity takes center stage.

Festival Highlights:

The King of All Birds (Apr 25-27) - A unique performance blending song, vocoder, and film collage to explore humanity's fascination with flight.

Tom Moran is a Big Fat Filthy Disgusting Liar (May 2-3) - A funny and heartfelt solo show on masculinity, childhood, and secrets.

Story of a Day – Scéal Lae (May 17-18) - A magical, music-filled exploration of everyday moments, perfect for kids.

The Libravian (May 24-25) - A whimsical adventure through stories of bravery for young audiences.
